title: Luxury House for Sale in Lake Road [HS6]
details:
Under Construction - Completion In June 2018

A beautifully designed 3-storey house located approx. 2 km from the Pelawatte Junction, within close proximity to all modern day conveniences. Accessible via a 15-20 foot access road, the property resides in a quiet residential neighborhood.

The property offers extensive living space along with four bedrooms and three bathrooms. The house features a spacious living & dining area, double garage, separate maids & drivers quarters, expansive rooftop terrace and landscaped gardens.

Ground Floor Plan
- Living & dining area open to the exterior garden and the indoor courtyard
- Guest bedroom & common washroom
- Kitchen [Includes kitchen yard]
- Enclosed parking space for 2 vehicles
- Separate maids & drivers quarters

1st Floor Plan
- TV lobby
- Master bedroom with walk-in closet & attached bathroom
- Two additional bedrooms with common washroom

2nd Floor Plan
- Lobby area
- Expansive rooftop terrace

Starting Price: LKR 45.5 Million Upwards
